details.description: Contact Learner Support for advice about help with childcare costs, accommodation
details.body:
Get advice about applying for help with childcare costs, grants and residential support while youâ€™re learning.

Learner Support helpline
0800 121 8989
Monday to Friday 9am to 5pm

The Learner Support helpline gives advice about:

  • Care to Learn
  • grants and bursaries for adult learners
  • Residential Support Scheme

tags.title: Apprenticeships,14 to 19 education and training at work

details.description: Includes finding a course, finding an apprenticeship, 16-19 Bursary Fund
Get help if you're at school, planning to go on to further or higher education, looking for training or interested in a student or career development loan.
If you're aged 19 or over, on a further education course and facing financial hardship, Discretionary Learner Support (DLS) could help with learning costs - who qualifies and how to apply

related.title: Grants and bursaries for adult learners

details.description: Financial help for adult learners that you don't have to pay back to cover study and training costs
There are different kinds of help you can get with the cost of childcare - vouchers, tax credits, free early education, Sure Start, Discretionary Learner Support, Childcare Grant, Care to Learn
